reviews.review: A classic that ultimately set the standard for other classics to come. While it has some problems, like the aged graphics and painful difficulty, I think this really deserves to be played.

One of the best FPS I ever played, I have seen a lot of reviews about outdated and buggy game play, but I have never seen single bug. Again, the game came out in 1998, so the graphics aren't all that perfect, but I recommend the game to everyone who wants a good challenge.

This is a very, very good and fun game as long as you know how to play it. Its design makes it so that even if you're like me and are awful at shooters, you'll still have plenty of fun with this game once you get used to its unique gameplay. Just remember the game's "Run, Think, Shoot, Live" tagline and you'll be fine.

Half Life 2 was the first FPS I ever played back when the Orange Box collection came out, and the original Half Life is pretty good even playing it so late. The graphics are clearly outdated, but everything is designed so well that it's never rough on the eyes.
J'ai bien aimÃ© ce jeu, qui a effectivement pris un coup de vieux mais qui Ã©tait sÃ»rement excellent dans son genre Ã  l'Ã©poque.

over the past two weeks i played half life for the first time and  considering its age this game is a masterpiece from the amazing narrative , a.i , weapons , puzzles, level design , combat and atmosphere . Half-life ticks all the boxes without sacrificing anything . The only faults I can think of are the npc's not having to much variety and annoying platforming especially in xen . But other than those minor problems the game is absolutely sublime .

Half-life is hands down one of the best and most revolutionary first person shooters of all time. Tho the shooting itself is simple the enviroments and level design are pretty awesome. There are no cutscenes and all the story you get is either by experiencing it for yourself or talking to security guars and scientists, which you can skip and murder them all if you desire.
